mil7.8.6:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bhojanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.6:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ maggupatthambhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ balaṃ vaḍḍheti;
mil7.8.6:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena puññavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ abhipatthitaṃ;
mil7.8.6:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokābhipatthitena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
